pyqgis_plugin.name: Parsel Bul
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin allows parcel information which clicked any point on canvas by user. Data comes from TKGM service. Data must be geographic coordinate system in order to load correctly in QGIS. Therefore please be sure to use WGS84 datum geographic coordinate system which has EPSG:4326 code.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Random Forest Classification
pyqgis_plugin.description: Random forests or random decision forestsare an ensemble learning method for classification, regression and other tasks, that operate by constructing a multitude of decision trees at training time and outputting the class that is the mode of the classes (classification) or mean prediction (regression) of the individual trees. Random decision forests correct for decision trees' habit of overfitting to their training set. This Plugin allows to use random forest algorithm to classify images and generate shape file of classified areas special big and meaningful parts. Specially you can use this plug-in to discriminate water and ground areas
